Package dev.prozilla.pine.core.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
dev.prozilla.pine.common.event.EventDispatcher<EntityEvent>
dev.prozilla.pine.core.entity.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lifecycle, Printable, ApplicationContext, ApplicationProvider, ComponentsContext, EntityContext, SceneContext, SceneProvider
public class Entity extends EventDispatcher<EntityEvent> implements Lifecycle, Printable, EntityContext, ComponentsContext, ApplicationProvider, SceneProvider
Represents a unique entity in the world with a list of components.
